channel.title: Comments on: The Perfect MMO City

item.title: By: Tormentus
item.dc:creator: Tormentus
item.description:
I am an alt maker, i have found that of the horde cities UC is by far the best - once you figure it out. It can be frustrating, to no end, but if you look at UC and IF, hmmmm separated a birth? TB is like olde Kelethin, careful of the mistep, it's a doozy, and like KElethin, a pain. As for Stormwind, one tip, swim. Look at the map of SW, notice where you want to go and dive into the canal, most places are easily reachable in this fashion. Darnassus, ahhh the jewel of the night elf realm, nicely done with professions and crafts somewhat together, but trying to find a class trainer, blech! Orgrimmar is prolly the the worst as if you port in and want to head to BG's, better hope yer horse isn't tired.
PB & J Time!! Torm
item.content:encoded:
I am an alt maker, i have found that of the horde cities UC is by far the best – once you figure it out. It can be frustrating, to no end, but if you look at UC and IF, hmmmm separated a birth? TB is like olde Kelethin, careful of the mistep, it’s a doozy, and like KElethin, a pain. As for Stormwind, one tip, swim. Look at the map of SW, notice where you want to go and dive into the canal, most places are easily reachable in this fashion. Darnassus, ahhh the jewel of the night elf realm, nicely done with professions and crafts somewhat together, but trying to find a class trainer, blech! Orgrimmar is prolly the the worst as if you port in and want to head to BG’s, better hope yer horse isn’t tired.

PB & J Time!!
Torm

item.title: By: WOWSZER.COM » Blog Archive » Mailboxes revisited
item.dc:creator: WOWSZER.COM » Blog Archive » Mailboxes revisited
item.description: [...] Well the nice people at AFK have formulated the ‘perfect MMORG’ city diagram. It’s mailbox heaven, but it lacks personality. I would love to see more mailboxes in every city of Azeroth. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Well the nice people at AFK have formulated the ‘perfect MMORG’ city diagram. It’s mailbox heaven, but it lacks personality. I would love to see more mailboxes in every city of Azeroth. […]

item.title: By: Hirebrand
item.dc:creator: Hirebrand
item.description: Eve Online has the best cities, everything you need in handy button form right there on the sidebar.
item.content:encoded: Eve Online has the best cities, everything you need in handy button form right there on the sidebar.

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description:
Now that you can ride around UC mounted it's definitely my favorite horde city. The circular design means that it's always a very fast trip to anywhere you need to go. Orgrimmar is too spread out and almost seems like it's confusing on purpose.
However, considering that the guards from any city will tell you where almost anything is, and gaming sites can fill in the rest of the blanks finding your way around any of the cities is pretty easy.
My one problem with Thunder Bluff has always been that you are foced to dismount when travelling between sections, which is just an unecessary hassle. If this is still the case that's reason enough for me not to go back there.
item.content:encoded:
Now that you can ride around UC mounted it’s definitely my favorite horde city. The circular design means that it’s always a very fast trip to anywhere you need to go. Orgrimmar is too spread out and almost seems like it’s confusing on purpose.

However, considering that the guards from any city will tell you where almost anything is, and gaming sites can fill in the rest of the blanks finding your way around any of the cities is pretty easy.

My one problem with Thunder Bluff has always been that you are foced to dismount when travelling between sections, which is just an unecessary hassle. If this is still the case that’s reason enough for me not to go back there.

item.title: By: Nonentity
item.dc:creator: Nonentity
item.description:
Maffix, that bread vendor is my dwarf chick's long lost sister. We have the same face and hair color.
I buy bread from her all the time to support her family.
item.content:encoded:
Maffix, that bread vendor is my dwarf chick’s long lost sister. We have the same face and hair color.

I buy bread from her all the time to support her family.

item.title: By: maffix
item.dc:creator: maffix
item.description: I don't care how you lay it out, as long as there's no fucking bread seller NPC spamming you every five minutes.
item.content:encoded: I don’t care how you lay it out, as long as there’s no fucking bread seller NPC spamming you every five minutes.

item.title: By: Eradon
item.dc:creator: Eradon
item.description: For me the most confusing and frustrating place has always been Undercity. 'Cause everythings the fakin same, where ever you go. I have never hated symmetry as much as when I first went to that infernal place...
item.content:encoded: For me the most confusing and frustrating place has always been Undercity. ‘Cause everythings the fakin same, where ever you go. I have never hated symmetry as much as when I first went to that infernal place…

item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description: now if that circle has a diameter of no more than 200 feet then you have my vote for city planner
item.content:encoded: now if that circle has a diameter of no more than 200 feet then you have my vote for city planner

item.title: By: Pete
item.dc:creator: Pete
item.description: You have to be at a specific location to check your mail in WoW? Doesn't that result in hideous crowds? How many towns are there anyway?
item.content:encoded: You have to be at a specific location to check your mail in WoW? Doesn’t that result in hideous crowds? How many towns are there anyway?

item.title: By: Hyd
item.dc:creator: Hyd
item.description: I'm with Vargen - Orgrimmar's layout flat-out sucks compared to TBs, especially if you're a blacksmith or engineer. Ironforge's layout isn't bad. Stormwind == Orgrimmar. I don't know Undercity well enough to have an opinion. That 'trainers and vendors all in one place' idea isn't bad, although it doesn't seem to work all that well for Darnassus in practice.
item.content:encoded: I’m with Vargen – Orgrimmar’s layout flat-out sucks compared to TBs, especially if you’re a blacksmith or engineer. Ironforge’s layout isn’t bad. Stormwind == Orgrimmar. I don’t know Undercity well enough to have an opinion. That ‘trainers and vendors all in one place’ idea isn’t bad, although it doesn’t seem to work all that well for Darnassus in practice.
